Subskills.name: Blast Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of comet.

Subskills.name: Molten Rock
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by comet.

Subskills.name: Fiery Shower
Subskills.description: Drop additional comets dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Skycaller
Subskills.description: Increases your cast rate when using comet.

Subskills.name: Comet Fragments
Subskills.description: Chance when comet hits the ground to rain down smaller comets.

Subskills.name: Molten Aftershock
Subskills.description: Chance when hitting the ground to unleash a fiery pulse dealing additional damage knocking monsters back.

Subskills.name: Stunning Hit
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun monsters.

Subskills.name: Crushing Comet
Subskills.description: Comet now smashes the ground with force sending monsters airborne with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Cracked Terrain
Subskills.description: Increased damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Searing Shrapnel
Subskills.description: Comet shrapnel flies farther dealing a portion of comets damage.

Subskills.name: Flaming Terrain
Subskills.description: Chance when hitting the ground to create flames dealing a portion of comets damage over time.

Subskills.name: Molten Starfall
Subskills.description: Drop multiple comets simultaneously. Comet now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Comets
Subskills.description: Drop multiple small comets bouncing forwards when landing.
